"Friendly Ghosts":
"I have but one last request for you.
It is in regards to Harriet...
After all the fun she has been having,
her face now tells a somber tale.
I suspect she has realized the truth.
Guardian... There is something she
must hear which only you can tell her.
...I am begging you.
※Talk to Harriet (Christmas)
in the Shop Area."
